high_level_goal: Update Technology, Live Demo, and Our Fleet pages for compliance and credibility

inputs.description: Remove autonomy/BVLOS claims and unverified stats from sub-pages. Make credible for sophisticated buyers.

NON_NEGOTIABLE_RULES.language: Replace autonomy with 'operator-led operations with AI-assisted detection'
NON_NEGOTIABLE_RULES.compliance: NO BVLOS marketing. Remove or label as 'not offered / future'
NON_NEGOTIABLE_RULES.numbers: Remove or qualify unverified stats like '99.2% accuracy', '2km detection'

subtasks.title: Technology page - Hero subtitle
subtasks.details: Replace subtitle 'Cutting-edge AI, autonomous systems...' with: 'Operator-led operations with AI-assisted detection and faster handoffs'

subtasks.title: Technology page - Autonomous Fleet Patrols
subtasks.details: Replace section title 'Autonomous Fleet Patrols' with 'Live Overwatch (Operator-led)'. Replace copy 'another automatically takes its place ensuring zero coverage gaps' with 'Planned battery rotation to minimize coverage gaps (operator-coordinated).'

subtasks.title: Technology page - SLAM/mapping claims
subtasks.details: Remove or soften 'SLAM (Simultaneous Localization and Mapping) technology to create detailed 3D models'. Replace with: 'Pre-event site walk + perimeter plan (optionally supported by mapping tools).'

subtasks.title: Technology page - Remove BVLOS
subtasks.details: Find any BVLOS references. Replace with: 'Operations comply with FAA Part 107 and mission-specific airspace/venue requirements.'

subtasks.title: Live Demo page - Hero subtitle
subtasks.details: Replace 'autonomous drone security system' with 'operator-led drone overwatch with AI-assisted alerting'

subtasks.title: Live Demo page - Remove unverified specs
subtasks.details: Remove 'Operating Range: 5 miles (8 km) BVLOS'. Remove any '99.x% accuracy' claims. For specs, use conservative approach: 'Specs vary by aircraft; we deploy mission-appropriate DJI platforms.' Add qualifiers like 'lab-tested under controlled conditions' if keeping any numbers.

subtasks.title: Live Demo page - AI & Autonomy section
subtasks.details: If there's an 'AI & Autonomy' header in specs, rename to 'AI-Assisted Detection'. Update content to be operator-led language.

subtasks.title: Our Fleet page - Add DJI Matrice 4T
subtasks.details: Add 'DJI Matrice 4T' as the FIRST/PRIMARY platform for overwatch. Keep Avata 2 as secondary (tight spaces). Keep Mavic 4 Pro as support if listed. Add link to official DJI specs.

subtasks.title: Our Fleet page - Fleet Capabilities
subtasks.details: Replace 'Autonomous Navigation' with 'Pre-planned routes + manual piloting (human-in-the-loop)' and 'AI-assisted detection for faster verification'

subtasks.title: Our Fleet page - Hero subtitle
subtasks.details: Change 'autonomous security operations' to 'operator-led security operations'

subtasks.title: Update navigation on all info pages
subtasks.details: Add 'Get Quote' link to nav on technology.html, live-demo.html, our-fleet.html pointing to '/quote' or 'quote.html'

deliverables: Updated our-fleet.html with Matrice 4T as primary + fixed capabilities
Get Quote nav item added to all pages

notes_from_legate: Sophisticated buyers will scrutinize every claim. Remove anything we can't defend. BVLOS is a 'credibility landmine'. The Matrice 4T is the founder's intended primary overwatch drone - make sure it's prominently featured. Keep the site looking professional but make claims conservative and defensible.
